ValidationRule.description: Force users to populate the Ticket Type field, depending on specific Status values.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ),
(NOT(ISNEW())), ($RecordType.Name = "Reference PAC Record Type" ), (ISPICKVAL(Ticket_Type__c, '')), ( (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - New Notice Received'))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Additional Notice Received'))) || (NOT(ISPICKVAL(Status__c, 'Pending PAC Review - Transferring to PAC Service & Support Team'))) ), ($Profile.Name <>"System Administrator") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a value in the Ticket Type field.
